channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 06:10 The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 06:10 The threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Find out, the alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#m_ Marganets_ta_Ametska_Marganetska_The. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:58 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lypetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
